Class Console

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public abstract class Console
extends Object
implements CommandExecutor

    • Method Detail

      • setServer

        public void setServer(Server server)
        Set the server this console is controlling. The console object might not use getServer() to get the server object, it may keep track of its own server object. Please refer to that object's documentation. =
        Parameters:
        server - The server this console is controlling.

      • sendGlobalMessage

        public void sendGlobalMessage(String message)
        Have the console send a global message
        Parameters:
        message - The message for the console to send

      • getServer

        public Server getServer()
        Get the server this console is controlling.
        Specified by:
        getServer in interface CommandExecutor
        Returns:
        The Server object

      • next

        public abstract String next()
        Get a String from the console. The way the string is gotten varies from console to console.
        Returns:
        The string

      • askForUpdate

        public abstract boolean askForUpdate(Updatable u)
        This method is called when the UpdateService detects an update
        and needs to ask the console Whether to update or not.
        This method should block until an answer is given/found
        and return whether the UpdateService should update or not.
        Parameters:
        u - The updatable object being updated.
        Returns:
        Whether the UpdateService should update or not.

      • alertOfManualUpdate

        public abstract void alertOfManualUpdate(Updatable u)
        This method is called when the UpdateService detects an update
        and the end user must manually download the update.
        Parameters:
        u - The updatable object the user must download and install.

      • nextInt

        public int nextInt()
        Get a Integer from the console. This method uses the next() method and parse the input to an integer.
        Returns:
        The int

      • nextLong

        public long nextLong()
        Get a Long from the console. This method uses the next() method and parse the input to a long.
        Returns:
        The long

      • nextBoolean

        public boolean nextBoolean()
        Get a boolean from the console. (Values that return true: "yes", "true", "accept", "allow", "permit") This method uses the next() method and parse the input to an boolean.
        Returns:
        The boolean
